dct_title_s: Net-Zero America carbon dioxide sources with capture for high-electrification scenario, 2050
dct_description_sm: This dataset shows carbon dioxide (CO2) point sources equipped with carbon capture technology in the contiguous United States by 2050 under a net-zero-emissions scenario with high electrification. For an overview of this "E+" high-electrification scenario, please refer to the "supplemental information" portion of this record.
dct_creator_sm: Andrew Pascale, Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Post-Doctoral Research Associate
Ejeong Baik, Department of Energy Resources Engineering, Stanford University, Ph.D. Candidate
Erin Mayfield, High Meadows Environmental Institute, Princeton University, Post-Doctoral Research Associate
